name: Cross Poison
summary: Deals damage, has an increased critical hit ratio, and has a 10% chance to poison the opponent.
viability: Poison Jab outclasses Cross Poison in every way, given the higher base power and poisoning chance. For those that don't get Poison Jab, like Crobat, Cross Poison is a nIce option. Crobat can run this move to take on Florges with minimal issue, due to Florges's poor physical Defense. Its base power is a bit low, though, so you would have to decide if the added coverage is worth the lack of power.
